channel.title: Made it
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e8YdNBxYm0U&feature=player_detailpage#t=11s
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZgiZM-0B5oA&feature=player_detailpage#t=170s
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2qbyut5.jpg[/img]
It's taken me nearly 5 months to get it, but as quorra and Sam would say, "Made It!"

item.title: Made it
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I contacted a few people on Sythe seeing if they were interested a few days ago already.

Also botted 99 dungeon and firemaking in the past month.

Read full topic

item.title: Made it
item.dc:creator: @chrisn2323 chrisn2323
item.description:
@chrisn2323 wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:29, topic:389420”]Yes.

Keep in mind that rares are over 1,000 USD(Party Hats). Even divines are about 1,000 USD.—>Better to sell these because they aren’t discontinued.

Best profit for divines: Sniping
It’s luck, but you can make extreme profit if you land one.

Right now I’ll tell you my method. I have a good friend who sells me gold for 50c/m and I sell it for 80/1.00M on sythe.
It’s a constant stock as he runs vps Sorc Garden on a giant cycle of bots.

I also try to scout items which I can flip. For example, I used to buy Santa’s for 75$ and sell for 85M. Sell the gold and reinvest. It’s all about being smart. Anyone can do it.(Keep in mind I’ve been doing this for several years now)[/quote]
If I were you I’d cash in on it before it becomes worthless.

Read full topic

item.title: Made it
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

tL:

If he gets away with it, without being banned, I’d feel like I had achieved something. He has got into the top 1000 without having to waste months of his life sat at his computer to get there, like many of the others in the top 1000 did.

No so much anymore

Read full topic

item.title: Made it
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Not as much as I once did. Gold has declined so much(1.00$ to now .60)

Also, I’m ranked under 500 for magic now, but for the past month or so I’ve been botting dung. At 95 now.

The sad revelation I had a few days ago was had I not insisted and getting nearly 40m xp in Mage, I could of had 99 prayer easily

Read full topic

item.title: Made it
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

Damn, that’s amazing casey. How much has your real life profit been/why don’t you cash out those rares? Also, what’s your sythe username? If I ever get back into the game and decide I want something black market, I’l go to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Made it
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

casey end game? Are you going to quit while your ahead? I knew had you rares - I idle in #runescape but didn’t realise it was a profit business. Once popularity or the next Jagex game comes out in ‘X’ years/months you might need to sell fast if you’re playing it risky. Virtual goods do not retain value for particularly long (a decade would be lucky).

Read full topic

item.title: Made it
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Yes.

Keep in mind that rares are over 1,000 USD(Party Hats). Even divines are about 1,000 USD.—>Better to sell these because they aren’t discontinued.

Best profit for divines: Sniping
It’s luck, but you can make extreme profit if you land one.

Right now I’ll tell you my method. I have a good friend who sells me gold for 50c/m and I sell it for 80/1.00M on sythe.
It’s a constant stock as he runs vps Sorc Garden on a giant cycle of bots.

I also try to scout items which I can flip. For example, I used to buy Santa’s for 75$ and sell for 85M. Sell the gold and reinvest. It’s all about being smart. Anyone can do it.(Keep in mind I’ve been doing this for several years now)

Read full topic

item.title: Made it
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

casey.:

(Gold, Accounts, ETC I’d be well over the 100,000 mark.

Wait what, dollars?

Read full topic

item.title: Made it
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:17, topic:389420”]how are you training it? stun alch?

If you have lots of $$ then casting blood barrage at soul wars centre gets about 400-600 exp per hit meaning you can get about 400-500k exp per hour plus the exp from the zeals as well[/quote]
Using melee. Only zeal on mage.

Greeny, my days of playing RS for fun are far over. I haven’t played for fun since about 2006 to be honest with you.
I honestly don’t know why I’m still doing this. I just find it funny seeing how (if I can) get in the top 100, than top 50, etc all by botting how much Jagex has failed. Remember, we (were) a RS cheating site and most of us on this site come from cheating backgrounds, so in the end I will always feel cheating wins.

Also, the script is a combination of mine and others. I had to make it suit me in the effort to maximize zeal and getting into games. It’s vital to get 9 zeal an hour in all honesty. Anything less and I view it as a failure.

@Playing their game, I get pins for about $2.00. I can pick that up on the ground if I want. Or in about a day of adsesne. Or sell 2m. It’s not much.

As said, my goal will always be to do the opposite of what Jagex says. I’m making A LOT of money off RS right now, in a 100% legal manner(I suppose I’m obliged to say that or I will be banned), but my goal is always to somehow make a profit. I don’t do anything illegal; I don’t steal accounts, phish, or scam cash. I find initiative merchanting ways and use social engineering to profit. You don’t hang around #Runescape much, but if you did you would know I have a large amount of rares(Being over 60,000) and have a few more coming soon(around 20 phats) from a person who promised me them but went MIA two years ago, but the guy is pretty much the reason this site exists so I have hope he’ll be back If I were to sell everything now(Gold, Accounts, ETC I’d be well over the 100,000 mark.

In all honesty, it’s not about winning. It’s about fun. I’m happy and enjoying life so what does it matter?

Also, I have enough zeal for Top 500.

Read full topic

item.title: Made it
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Actually I can, and that’s why I made the point in post. If I had 100,000 valid arguments against a single statement then you’d almost definitely be wrong and I’d almost definitely be right (not claiming this is the case here at all, you said it not me )

Wasn’t meaning to argue anyway, I just laughed at you referring to it as an “achievement” since any sense of achievement is entirely down to the individual. On an individual scale, you might be the richest man on Earth and feel it a huge achievement, on a cosmic scale you’ve achieved a grand total of fuck all

Read full topic

item.title: Made it
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:18, topic:389420”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=485338.msg3563937#msg3563937 date=1302482826]

Well its hardly a good place for him to bring up his anti bot drivel is it
[/quote]I was just saying he shouldn’t feel achieved, he didn’t do anything.

Yes he did. He beat Jagex.

Hmm, so many things wrong with this for such a short post… Doubt casey made the bot, and potentially could have but probably didn’t make the script. Jagex made the game, and make the profit, which players and botters fuel.

In all brutal honesty though I think that’s a total waste of time, I for one wouldn’t macro a skill beyond 99 since there is no actual ingame gains beyond 99 (no psychological accomplishment as you didn’t actually do it. No real world accomplishment because who the hell looks at RS highscores past the top 20, or even remembers any of the names)
I can understand botting yourself a pure/skills/money but not really this, so I’m interested in your motivation? Maybe that a lot of that account was botted and you got bored, in which case fair enough.[/quote]
Of course you can make 10^5 valid arguments against my stance, but you can’t deny that he has ‘beaten’ Jagex to a certain extent.

Read full topic

item.title: Made it
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:15, topic:389420”][quote author=cumescape link=topic=485338.msg3563834#msg3563834 date=1302475909]

Well its hardly a good place for him to bring up his anti bot drivel is it
[/quote]I was just saying he shouldn’t feel achieved, he didn’t do anything.

Yes he did. He beat Jagex.[/quote]

Hmm, so many things wrong with this for such a short post… Doubt casey made the bot, and potentially could have but probably didn’t make the script. Jagex made the game, and make the profit, which players and botters fuel.

In all brutal honesty though I think that’s a total waste of time, I for one wouldn’t macro a skill beyond 99 since there is no actual ingame gains beyond 99 (no psychological accomplishment as you didn’t actually do it. No real world accomplishment because who the hell looks at RS highscores past the top 20, or even remembers any of the names)
I can understand botting yourself a pure/skills/money but not really this, so I’m interested in your motivation? Maybe that a lot of that account was botted and you got bored, in which case fair enough.

Read full topic
